settings.review_des: Thanks for letting me be one of the first to review this product. I've tried many security cameras over the years and the X3 is easily among the best. It delivers crisp 4k visuals and its color night vision is a game-changer. Easy setup means you're up and running in minutes. The app is very easy to use and motion detection is pretty accurate. Highly recommend!

settings.heading: Start Protecting Your Home and Loved Ones TODAY:

settings.text: With the X3's 8MP camera, you can see every detail with high-quality images and videos. Its 4K video capability, color fidelity, and 5X digital zoom ensure nothing is overlooked.
Starlight Night Vision unveils every detail in the dark, using minimal ambient light to enhance your nighttime view.
Get all-important notifications and receive only the alerts that matter to you, courtesy of the key motion detection modes available now.
Interact with Premium Invention's security cams featuring two-way audio, high-res visuals, and motion detection for immediate control and convenience.

Premium Invention brings you global protection with high-resolution security cams and an intuitive app. Embrace peace of mind and control, with our system bridging distances to keep you connected to what matters most.

The camera offers two-way storage with a micro 128GB SD card option and subscription-based cloud storage. Seamlessly integrate with our proprietary NVRs or any ONVIF-compatible third-party system for a unified experience.

settings.des_info: Each order goes through a full quality-inspection with care. All products come with a 365days of warranty.
All e-mails are responded to by real people (no bots) within 24hours. Video calls are also available if additional assistance is required.
Express shipping delivers in 2-5 days in the USA & 7-15 days in other countries. Easily track your order's every step of the way from our website.

settings.title: When will my order arrive?
settings.answer:
USA - 2 to 5 business days

Canada - 10 to 12 business days

Australia & New Zealand - 6 to 10 business days

Other countries - 10 to 20 business days

settings.title: How much data does this use?
settings.answer: The data consumption for the X3 wired camera varies by resolution:To view footage in SD, it uses 512kbps to 1Mbps per minuteTo view footage in HD, it uses 1.5Mbps to 2Mbps per minuteIf you're using the camera in a WiFi-enabled location, data usage is typically not a concern when monitoring locally. However, streaming remotely via a mobile network will consume data based on the above rates.

settings.title: Where can I save and watch the recorded videos?
settings.answer: You can choose to save the recorded video to an SD card, NVR, or cloud storage. You can then play back the recorded videos using the application.

settings.title: Can I manually record?
settings.answer: YES! The application allows you to manually record videos as well as take photos with a tap of a button.

settings.heading: Product Support
settings.text: We're here to assist you with any questions or requests about our product. Feel free to reach out anytime, and we'll be delighted to help.
